description: The dropdown is agnostic of font sizes, so just change the font size of the trigger by adding typography classes.  This variation is what is called a filter dropdown which is used on the game library.  Note that you can also change the font size of the menu itself and have it different from the font size of the trigger by adding the typography classes to the trigger and the dropdown seperately.
